snippet: About 70 children and 10 adults were overcome by carbon monoxide at a day care northwest of Montreal on Tuesday and were rushed to the hospital by ambulances and school buses.
abstract: About 70 children and 10 adults are rushed to the hospital after they are overcome by carbon monoxide at a day care northwest of Montreal.
lead_paragraph: About 70 children and 10 adults were overcome by carbon monoxide at a day care northwest of Montreal on Tuesday and were rushed to the hospital by ambulances and school buses.

headline.main: Canada: Carbon Monoxide Affects Scores at Day Care
headline.print_headline: Canada: Carbon Monoxide Affects Scores at Day Care
